remarks: Lemma involving norm of differences in Hilbert space.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: norm3lemt $p |- ( ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H ) /\ ( C e. ~H /\ D e. RR ) ) -> ( ( ( normh ` ( A -h C ) ) < ( D / 2 ) /\ ( normh ` ( C -h B ) ) < ( D / 2 ) ) -> ( normh ` ( A -h B ) ) < D ) ) $.
